title: CIA Agent Confesses on Deathbed: ‘We Blew Up WTC7 on 9/11’?
subtitle: Reports that a dying CIA agent confessed to blowing up WTC Building 7 on 9/11 through controlled demolition are fake news.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A dying CIA agent confessed to blowing up WTC Building 7 on 9/11 through controlled demolition.
